id.label: Unique ID
id.help: Provide a unique identifier using lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, or underscores that will be used to describe a unique name for your net. IDs. Unique ID means that the ID cannot repeat.

name.label: Net name
name.help: Enter the friendly title that should appear on the Blind Hams listings.

category.label: Category
category.help: Pick the category that best matches the net. Only choose a new category when you have approval to add one.

newCategory.label: New category name
newCategory.help: Type the name for the new category. Keep it short and consistent with existing options.

description.label: Description
description.help: Describe the focus of the net. One or two clear sentences is usually perfect.

start_local.label: Start time
start_local.help: Enter the official start time in the net’s local time zone.

time_zone.label: Time zone
time_zone.help: Choose the net’s time zone when it differs from the site default.

custom_time_zone.label: Custom time zone
custom_time_zone.help: Supply a full IANA time zone, such as America/Denver or Europe/London.

duration_min.label: Duration
duration_min.help: Set the length of the net in minutes so schedules and end times calculate correctly.

rrule.label: RRULE
rrule.help: Paste or build the recurrence rule that describes when the net meets.

location.label: Location
location.help: List where people join the net, including links or repeater details.

mode.label: Mode
mode.help: Note the operating mode or platform such as FM, DMR, AllStar, or Zoom.

dmr_system.label: DMR system
dmr_system.help: If this net uses DMR, record the network name such as BrandMeister or TGIF.

dmr_tg.label: DMR talkgroup
dmr_tg.help: Add the DMR talkgroup number or numbers used for the net.

allstar.label: AllStar
allstar.help: Provide the AllStar node numbers or hubs that host the net.

echolink.label: EchoLink
echolink.help: List the EchoLink conferences or node numbers listeners should call.

frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.help: Give the RF frequency, plus tone or offset if needed.

dstar.label: D-STAR
dstar.help: Identify the D-STAR reflectors or modules linked for the net.

peanut.label: Peanut
peanut.help: Include Peanut room information if the net is available there.

zoom.label: Zoom
zoom.help: Paste the Zoom meeting URL or ID if a Zoom room is offered.

notes.label: Notes
notes.help: Capture any other details maintainers should know, such as temporary schedules or NCO rotations.
